seo.title: Build contextual editing into your site
seo.description: Open-source visual editing experience, backed by git.

blocks.intro: Tina has a **per-project** pricing model that can scale to meet your needs.

base.name: Basic
base.body:
* 2 Users
* 2 Roles
* No Additional Users
* Forum Support

plans.name: Team
plans.body:
* 3 Users
* 2 Roles
* Max 10 Users
* Additional Users $9/seat
* Forum Support

plans.name: Business
plans.body:
* 10 Users
* 3 Roles *(coming soon)*
* No User Limit
* Additional Users $9/seat
* Priority Support
* SSO 
* Approval flow *(coming soon)*

plans.name: Enterprise
plans.body:
**Bulk pricing available**

* Custom Users
* Custom Roles
* No User Limit
* Variable user pricing
* Enterprise Support
* SSO 
* Custom workflows

plans.name: Agency
plans.body:
**Bulk pricing available**

* Custom Users
* Custom Roles
* No User Limit
* Variable user pricing
* Custom Support
* SSO
* Custom workflows
* White Label *(coming soon)*
